m_szDocTitle: News:Archive:Page 3:October 28, 2011 Test of the One Megawatt E-Cat - PESWiki
m_szDocSumamry: News:Archive:Page 3:October 28, 2011 Test of the One Megawatt E-Cat From PESWiki Jump to: navigation , search Page 3 of our archives of the updates we have been posting about the October 28, 2011 test of the 1 MW E-Cat (Energy Catalyzer) in Bologna, Italy, attended by around 30 observers, and carried out by scientists/engineers of the customer. Covering October 29-31, 2011 Click here for the most recent updates. Contents Sent: Monday, October 31, 2011 4:12 PM [MST] Subject: Re: Transcription & Video of Report and Q&A with Rossi [...] Yesterday I looked over the Italian translation of your rebu
